speaker: WARWICK
text:
Forspent
               
              with
               
              toil
              ,
               
              as
               
              runners
               
              with
               
              a
               
              race
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
I
               
              lay
               
              me
               
              down
               
              a
               
              little
               
              while
               
              to
               
              breathe
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
For
               
              strokes
               
              received
               
              and
               
              many
               
              blows
               
              repaid

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Have
               
              robbed
               
              my
               
              strong-knit
               
              sinews
               
              of
               
              their
               
              strength
              ;

speaker: WARWICK
text:
And
               
              spite
               
              of
               
              spite
              ,
               
              needs
               
              must
               
              I
               
              rest
               
              awhile
              .

speaker: EDWARD
text:
Smile
              ,
               
              gentle
               
              heaven
              ,
               
              or
               
              strike
              ,
               
              ungentle
               
              death
              ,

speaker: EDWARD
text:
For
               
              this
               
              world
               
              frowns
               
              and
               
              Edward’s
               
              sun
               
              is
               
              clouded
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
How
               
              now
              ,
               
              my
               
              lord
              ,
               
              what
               
              hap
              ?
               
              What
               
              hope
               
              of
               
              good
              ?

speaker: GEORGE
text:
Our
               
              hap
               
              is
               
              loss
              ,
               
              our
               
              hope
               
              but
               
              sad
               
              despair
              ;

speaker: GEORGE
text:
Our
               
              ranks
               
              are
               
              broke
              ,
               
              and
               
              ruin
               
              follows
               
              us
              .

speaker: GEORGE
text:
What
               
              counsel
               
              give
               
              you
              ?
               
              Whither
               
              shall
               
              we
               
              fly
              ?

speaker: EDWARD
text:
Bootless
               
              is
               
              flight
              ;
               
              they
               
              follow
               
              us
               
              with
               
              wings
              ,

speaker: EDWARD
text:
And
               
              weak
               
              we
               
              are
               
              and
               
              cannot
               
              shun
               
              pursuit
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Ah
              ,
               
              Warwick
              ,
               
              why
               
              hast
               
              thou
               
              withdrawn
               
              thyself
              ?

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Thy
               
              brother’s
               
              blood
               
              the
               
              thirsty
               
              earth
               
              hath
               
              drunk
              ,

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Broached
               
              with
               
              the
               
              steely
               
              point
               
              of
               
              Clifford’s
               
              lance
              ,

speaker: RICHARD
text:
And
               
              in
               
              the
               
              very
               
              pangs
               
              of
               
              death
               
              he
               
              cried
              ,

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Like
               
              to
               
              a
               
              dismal
               
              clangor
               
              heard
               
              from
               
              far
              ,

speaker: RICHARD
text:
“
              Warwick
              ,
               
              revenge
              !
               
              Brother
              ,
               
              revenge
               
              my
               
              death
              !
              ”

speaker: RICHARD
text:
So
              ,
               
              underneath
               
              the
               
              belly
               
              of
               
              their
               
              steeds
              ,

speaker: RICHARD
text:
That
               
              stained
               
              their
               
              fetlocks
               
              in
               
              his
               
              smoking
               
              blood
              ,

speaker: RICHARD
text:
The
               
              noble
               
              gentleman
               
              gave
               
              up
               
              the
               
              ghost
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Then
               
              let
               
              the
               
              earth
               
              be
               
              drunken
               
              with
               
              our
               
              blood
              !

speaker: WARWICK
text:
I’ll
               
              kill
               
              my
               
              horse
               
              because
               
              I
               
              will
               
              not
               
              fly
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Why
               
              stand
               
              we
               
              like
               
              soft-hearted
               
              women
               
              here
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Wailing
               
              our
               
              losses
               
              whiles
               
              the
               
              foe
               
              doth
               
              rage
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
And
               
              look
               
              upon
              ,
               
              as
               
              if
               
              the
               
              tragedy

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Were
               
              played
               
              in
               
              jest
               
              by
               
              counterfeiting
               
              actors
              ?

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Here
               
              on
               
              my
               
              knee
               
              I
               
              vow
               
              to
               
              God
               
              above

speaker: WARWICK
text:
I’ll
               
              never
               
              pause
               
              again
              ,
               
              never
               
              stand
               
              still
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Till
               
              either
               
              death
               
              hath
               
              closed
               
              these
               
              eyes
               
              of
               
              mine

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Or
               
              Fortune
               
              given
               
              me
               
              measure
               
              of
               
              revenge
              .

speaker: EDWARD
text:
O
               
              Warwick
              ,
               
              I
               
              do
               
              bend
               
              my
               
              knee
               
              with
               
              thine
              ,

speaker: EDWARD
text:
And
               
              in
               
              this
               
              vow
               
              do
               
              chain
               
              my
               
              soul
               
              to
               
              thine

speaker: EDWARD
text:
And
              ,
               
              ere
               
              my
               
              knee
               
              rise
               
              from
               
              the
               
              Earth’s
               
              cold
               
              face
              ,

speaker: EDWARD
text:
I
               
              throw
               
              my
               
              hands
              ,
               
              mine
               
              eyes
              ,
               
              my
               
              heart
               
              to
               
              Thee
              ,

speaker: EDWARD
text:
Thou
               
              setter
               
              up
               
              and
               
              plucker
               
              down
               
              of
               
              kings
              ,

speaker: EDWARD
text:
Beseeching
               
              Thee
              ,
               
              if
               
              with
               
              Thy
               
              will
               
              it
               
              stands

speaker: EDWARD
text:
That
               
              to
               
              my
               
              foes
               
              this
               
              body
               
              must
               
              be
               
              prey
              ,

speaker: EDWARD
text:
Yet
               
              that
               
              Thy
               
              brazen
               
              gates
               
              of
               
              heaven
               
              may
               
              ope

speaker: EDWARD
text:
And
               
              give
               
              sweet
               
              passage
               
              to
               
              my
               
              sinful
               
              soul
              .

speaker: EDWARD
text:
Now
              ,
               
              lords
              ,
               
              take
               
              leave
               
              until
               
              we
               
              meet
               
              again
              ,

speaker: EDWARD
text:
Where’er
               
              it
               
              be
              ,
               
              in
               
              heaven
               
              or
               
              in
               
              Earth
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Brother
              ,
               
              give
               
              me
               
              thy
               
              hand
              .
              —
              And
              ,
               
              gentle
               
              Warwick
              ,

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Let
               
              me
               
              embrace
               
              thee
               
              in
               
              my
               
              weary
               
              arms
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
I
               
              that
               
              did
               
              never
               
              weep
               
              now
               
              melt
               
              with
               
              woe

speaker: RICHARD
text:
That
               
              winter
               
              should
               
              cut
               
              off
               
              our
               
              springtime
               
              so
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Away
              ,
               
              away
              !
               
              Once
               
              more
              ,
               
              sweet
               
              lords
              ,
               
              farewell
              .

speaker: GEORGE
text:
Yet
               
              let
               
              us
               
              all
               
              together
               
              to
               
              our
               
              troops

speaker: GEORGE
text:
And
               
              give
               
              them
               
              leave
               
              to
               
              fly
               
              that
               
              will
               
              not
               
              stay
              ,

speaker: GEORGE
text:
And
               
              call
               
              them
               
              pillars
               
              that
               
              will
               
              stand
               
              to
               
              us
              ;

speaker: GEORGE
text:
And
              ,
               
              if
               
              we
               
              thrive
              ,
               
              promise
               
              them
               
              such
               
              rewards

speaker: GEORGE
text:
As
               
              victors
               
              wear
               
              at
               
              the
               
              Olympian
               
              Games
              .

speaker: GEORGE
text:
This
               
              may
               
              plant
               
              courage
               
              in
               
              their
               
              quailing
               
              breasts
              ,

speaker: GEORGE
text:
For
               
              yet
               
              is
               
              hope
               
              of
               
              life
               
              and
               
              victory
              .

speaker: GEORGE
text:
Forslow
               
              no
               
              longer
              ;
               
              make
               
              we
               
              hence
               
              amain
              .
